name: Building Up
description:
Building Up is a top down shooter made for ludum dare 45. The theme is "start with nothing".

Gameplay

The buildings grow one floor each time the health bar reaches its maximum. Each completed building (4 floors) raises your score multiplier (x2).
Once the last building that appeared is destroyed, no more buildings will be created. Watch out for this one. ;)

Controls
WASD - move
Left click - shoot
Right click - dash
